content.query:
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[tblEmployee]
(
    empID nvarchar(218),
    empName nvarchar(218),
    salary nvarchar(218),
    dep nvarchar(218)
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO

COPY INTO [dbo].[tblEmployee]
( empID 1, empName 2, salary 3,dep 4)
FROM 'https://abhisheksynapsedlgen2.dfs.core.windows.net/synapsedemo/employees.csv'
WITH
(
    FILE_TYPE = 'CSV',
    MAXERRORS = 0,
    IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
)

SELECT * FROM [dbo].[tblEmployee]
